loveStory.title: Our Love Story
loveStory.subtitle: The journey that brought us together

timeline.title: First Meeting
timeline.description: We met at a coffee shop in Dalat during a weekend getaway. What started as a chance encounter over spilled coffee became the beginning of our beautiful journey together.

timeline.title: First Adventure
timeline.description: Our first big adventure together was a backpacking trip through Northern Vietnam. We discovered we were perfect travel companions and that we both loved getting lost in new places.

timeline.title: Moving In
timeline.description: We decided to take the next step and move in together in Ho Chi Minh City. Building a home together taught us so much about love, patience, and compromise.

timeline.title: The Proposal
timeline.description: Under a blanket of stars on a beach in Da Nang, Nam got down on one knee and asked the question that would change our lives forever. Of course, Linh said yes!

eventDetails.title: Wedding Details

ceremony.title: Ceremony

reception.address: 8 Nguyen Binh Khiem, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

eventDetails.dressCodeDescription: We'd love to see you in pastels and soft colors that complement our romantic theme.

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.subtitle: Please let us know if you can join us for our special day

thankYou.title: Thank You
thankYou.message: We can't wait to celebrate this special day with our loved ones. Your presence means the world to us!
